action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can abluty, uningne, athemb, altric, polotit and arimic.

Your goal for this game is: Make the chophal permity, the hooiced nionian and the nousion nophyle.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a hydroft now. There are a hooiced, a alloger, a eleniced, a gicalio, a glogly and a chophal. There is a passage to a itink here.
